titleStmt.title: The fatal contract, a French tragedy as it vvas acted vvith great applause by Her Majesties servants / written by William Hemings ...
titleStmt.author: Hemings, William, b. 1602?

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: A. T.; A. P.
Revived by Settle in 1675 as "Love and revenge", and reprinted in 1687, from text of 1653, under title: The eunuch.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
